painPoints.title: SME Customer Acquisition Costs Rising
painPoints.description: Competition for SME customers driving up acquisition costs. Need faster, more efficient quote-to-cash process.

painPoints.title: Complex Product Bundling Requirements
painPoints.description: O2 Business expanding into IoT and connectivity solutions requiring complex bundling capabilities beyond current CPQ scope.

opportunities.title: IoT Solutions CPQ Module
opportunities.description: Expand CPQ to handle IoT device + connectivity bundles as O2 pushes into IoT market

opportunities.title: Self-Service SME Portal Enhancement
opportunities.description: Enhance self-service capabilities for SME customers to reduce acquisition costs
